solution_line_template: He had {initial_sheets} sheets and received {received_sheets} more for a total of {initial_sheets}+{received_sheets} = <<{initial_sheets}+{received_sheets}={total_after_receiving}>>{total_after_receiving} sheets
He gave out {gave_sheets} so he has {total_after_receiving}-{gave_sheets} = <<{total_after_receiving}-{gave_sheets}={sheets_left}>>{sheets_left} sheets
